spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout and adjacencies largely match the 2D plan (Bedroom-3 left, Living/Dining center, Kitchen/Utility bottom center, Bedrooms 1&2 right, Toilets in same clusters). However, notable proportion/dimension changes are present: Living & Dining is reduced from 23'10" x 12'11" to 20'10" x 12'11" (E4), and Bedroom-1 changes from 16'5" x 14'6" to 13'6" x 14'8" (E4). Minor dimension drift also appears (e.g., Utility 4'5" x 8'7" to 4'6" x 8'7"). Door and window locations appear mostly consistent with the original, with no major relocations detected from the provided images.

structural_fidelity.notes: No rooms appear missing and no extra rooms are introduced; adjacency relationships (e.g., Kitchen↔Living/Dining, Bedroom-2↔Toilet-2, Bedroom-1↔Toilet-1, Bedroom-3↔Toilet-3/4, balconies/deck access) remain consistent. Wall thickness styling differs and some wall/shaft blocks appear visually heavier/darker, which slightly impacts fidelity but does not clearly break the plan. Doors appear embedded plausibly, though exact swing/orientation fidelity cannot be fully verified due to the render being essentially another 2D plan rather than a 3D model.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture placements broadly match (beds in bedrooms, dining table in Living/Dining, sofa grouping, kitchen counters). Scale appears generally consistent, though the proportion changes in Living/Dining and Bedroom-1 imply furniture-to-room scaling may be indirectly distorted relative to the original dimensions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The second image is not a 3D isometric render; it is a 2D top-down plan-style graphic. As a result, isometric camera correctness is not met and orthographic/isometric projection criteria are largely failed. Visual clarity is acceptable and geometry is clean for a 2D plan, but lighting/shading is minimal and not representative of a 3D isometric scene.

detected_errors.description: Living & Dining proportions/dimensions differ: 23'10" x 12'11" (original) vs 20'10" x 12'11" (generated).
Bedroom-1 proportions/dimensions differ: 16'5" x 14'6" (original) vs 13'6" x 14'8" (generated).
Minor dimension drift: Utility shown as 4'5" x 8'7" (original) vs 4'6" x 8'7" (generated).
Provided '3D isometric render' is not isometric/3D; it appears to be a re-styled 2D plan view (rendering/output type mismatch).
